thread.title: Ann valued Customer
thread.title_full: Cook Travel reviewed by Ann valued Customer

author: Ann valued Customer
title: Ann valued Customer
text: Our Cook's agent was expert at coordinating the travel arrangements for the various members of our group, coming from different locations. He made what could have been stressful into a really enjoyable part of our travel planning! I have such confidence in his ability to understand our objectives, and will call on him for all future travel.
